game.engine.terrain

Class Terrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.terrain.Terrain

  • public class Terrain
extends java.lang.Object
    Terrain class contains data of surrounding chunks ChunkData.
    Author:
    Kim

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Terrain(int x, int z)
      Creates terrain object with CenterChunk(x, z)

      Method loads all the surrounding chunks.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Terrain

        public Terrain(int x,
               int z)
        Creates terrain object with CenterChunk(x, z)
        Parameters:
        x - Coordinate of the center chunk.
        z - Coordinate of the center chunk.

    • Method Detail

      • loadChunks

        public void loadChunks()
        Method loads all the surrounding chunks.

      • loadModel

        public TerrainModel loadModel()
        Method that is used to load terrain model. Creates vertices array containing every vertex point as well as indices array containing every line connecting different vertices.
        Returns:
        TerrainModel object that represents mesh data of the terrain.

      • setCurrentChunk

        public void setCurrentChunk(int x,
                            int z)
        Sets the current chunk of this terrain. Terrain data should be reloaded after call to this method.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the new center chunk.
        z - Z coordinate of the new center chunk.
